problem.p: Consider the situation shown in the picture below: a person is trying to move a very heavy safe by pushing it along the ground. The force applied by the person to the safe is perfectly horizontal. Neither the person nor the safe is moving.
The force applied by the person to the safe and the force applied by the safe to the person are:
My answer to part 1 is justified because:

choicegroup.choice: Otherwise the safe would break or dent.
The safe is much heavier than the person.
Every action has an equal and opposite reaction.
The system composed of the person and safe is not accelerating.
